entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Cochrane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:43 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.5Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Timmins Victor Power Airport 12:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -9.1°C
Wind: E 35 km/h gust 47 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of ice pellets or snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of ice pellets mixed with freezing rain near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 70 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. Temperature falling to zero in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early in the morning then 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. A few flurries beginning late in the morning. Risk of snow squalls in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Temperature falling to zero in the morning then steady. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
